lexUnit.name: order.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: to request an object from someone, usually in exchange for money

sentence.text: He had entered the lounge at twenty past two and had ordered a sandwich and a large measure of whisky , which he 'd consumed quickly .
I would order a pint of cold beer .
I knew he was perfect for me the first time I heard him order a pint of mild .
She followed him into the dining-room and sat quietly while he ordered breakfast for her .
The Englishman ordered breakfast for both from room service and when the waiter had gone , spread out a huge motoring map of Germany , West and East .
We found a pretty hideous street-corner boozer and Malpass ordered two pints of Charrington bitter .

The locals thought she was a stuck-up bitch from Belfast , which she played up to the hilt , and the other guests -- foreigners , mostly Dutch and Germans by their collar sizes -- were taken by her vivacity , and the calm indulgence of the quiet , handsome man opposite her , who said little , smiled a lot , and ordered a second full fried breakfast in a way that had the waitress fit to melt into his arms .
` I had ordered sandwiches by phone two minutes earlier and was about to leave the building to pick them up .
Filmer came alone to sit at an untenanted table , ordering eggs and coffee from Oliver without looking at him .
It all helps to give clients confidence and peace of mind when ordering print and design .
If more than one item is ordered , they well be dispatched in separate packs .

Original example of the officer 's khaki field blouse approved in May 1898 , here with the white shoulder straps ordered in September 1899 , and the metal insignia of a lieutenant in the 8th Infantry .
I can see the coffee houses ordering enormous quantities -- if what I tasted at supper yesterday is any guide -- `
You will almost certainly come up against the person who has ordered something and then decided they do n't want it .
Yanto and Billy heard the blonde tell the landlord that it was her birthday as she ordered the drinks .
I ordered by credit card on Wednesday .
